title: Main TIPSY configuration describing a series of measurements

id.description: The =id= parameter sets a name for the benchmark

scale.description:
=scale= describes the way the individual benchmark instances in the scalability benchmark are to be executed.  TIPSY allows to easily request and perform scalability tests by repeating the benchmark multiple times, each time setting one or all parameters as controlled by the =scale= setting:
  =none=: do not perform scalability tests,
 =outer=: take the outer product of all settings specified for the benchmark and generate a separate test case for all,
 =joint=: scale the parameters jointly.

hostname.description: Hostname that can be used to ssh into SUT without a password as 'ssh hostname'.  Edit ~/.ssh/config for more complicated scenarios.  See man page: ssh_config (5)

tipsy-dir.description: A directory on SUT in which TIPSY is installed

bess-dir.description: A directory on SUT in which bess is installed

uplink_port.description: Port name ('eth1') or pci addr for DPDK ('0000:0b:00.0') or DPDK port number (in case of moongen, e.g., '0') [TODO: we could calculate this from the pci_addr]
